data.message:
Riding the Startup Bus to SxSw where we are building an app in 72 hours. Sina Khanifar, Simon Murtha-Smith and I are creating an app called Gaggle.

Gaggle records all the social media updates from your friends while at an event, and then stops when its over. You can create temporary social networks for single serving friends at a conference or relive a party with your close friends the next day.

Signup for it and let us know what you think! - http://getgaggle.com
data.name: Gaggle - Condense your friends social feeds to just those that matter.
data.caption: beta.getgaggle.com
data.description: Check out Gaggle, an awesome new StartupBus company that's condensing your social network to just the people who matter.

data.message:
Dear Simon, 
When do I get to see u guys again? Are u in SFO during thx giving? I will be in SFO during thanksgiving. I want to go to the Indian food buffet. 

Over and out,
Kyle
Not sure! We'll actually be in San Luis Obispo on Thanksgiving. If you've never had a dosa, you should look into that. Changed my life.
if you and Justin have bunk beds in the apt when I get back, we might have to chat...
I had someone come by over the weekend while we we're gone and take care of it. I'll call you in the morning...

Simon Murtha-Smith likes Three Cats Dads.
data.name: Three Cats Dads
data.caption: Fictional Character

data.message: dude, where in california do you live? it doesn't matter, you should come to santa cruz and hang out!
I'm in SF man! You coming up this way any time soon?
So close, but so far. I was actually up there the weekend of the 14th, but I don't make it up too often. Maybe in the next few weeks though. What brought you out?
Hi simon! Got your response card.. are you two living in cali now??? I still want you to be an usher if that's ok with you and plan to have you walk anji down the isle.. do you have a black suit/tux?
Yep, we moved out here last month! Yes, I'd still love to be an usher! I have a dark grey suit - is that ok?

Hm, I guess its kind of important to me that everyone is in black... would you mind renting a tux like the groomsmen? If u sent me ur measurements I could make the arrangements for you and then you could go with sam to pick them up. Also, the rehearsal dinner is 2 days before, Thursday night- will u be able to make that? Can't believe you moved to cali andd I didn't know! Just like I didn't know when you moved to ny... is it because I'm the baby?? We are going to cali on our honeymoon :)
